thread.title_full: Baseball Instructor - Cherry Hill - Sports Management

title: Baseball Instructor - Cherry Hill - Sports Management
text: Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Performs Private hitting lessons. Performs Group hitting lessons. Leads hitting stations in team practices. Head or Assistant coach on travel team (optional).   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
